thought: To craft a quartz_pillar, I need to craft two quartz_blocks. To craft a quartz_block, I need to place two quartz side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one quartz from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
